description:
RE/MAX Mobile brings the New Jersey real estate market to your Palm! For the first time, you have access to all homes for sale in the Garden State anytime, anywhere.  From the New Jersey suburbs outside NYC to shore homes along the coast, RE/MAX Mobile lets you search thousands of listings and compare home prices from the convenience of your phone.

With RE/MAX Mobile:

Search thousands of listings in all nine New Jersey MLSs. 

Utilize the GPS feature to search for homes near you.

Save favorites to quickly access properties later.  

Send a property to a friend via text or email, or send the app using the “Send to a Friend” feature. 

Utilize the “Call” feature to connect with a RE/MAX of New Jersey Professional in your area. 

Or

Already working with a RE/MAX of New Jersey Agent? Download the app to stay connected with your Agent.
versionNote:
· Redesign of the app  
· Improved performance
· Better stability 
· Better usability with more user friendly interface · Additional property view options 
· Upgraded Save Search/Favorites capability
